mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_obj (spc_cd, name, sex_cd, bth_ymd, obj_mode, stat_cd, market_ok, own_usr_id) VALUES (#{spcCd}, #{name}, #{sexCd}, #{bthYmd}, #{objMode}, #{statCd}, #{marketOk}, #{ownUsrId})
mapper.select: SELECT obj_id, spc_cd, name, sex_cd, bth_ymd, obj_mode, stat_cd, market_ok, own_usr_id FROM tb_obj WHERE own_usr_id = #{ownerId} ORDER BY obj_id
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_obj SET spc_cd = #{spcCd}, name = #{name}, sex_cd = #{sexCd}, bth_ymd = #{bthYmd}, obj_mode = #{objMode}, stat_cd = #{statCd}, market_ok = #{marketOk} WHERE obj_id = #{id}
